searchTerms.title: Search Terms
searchTerms.description: Array of sneaker models or keywords to search (e.g., 'Air Jordan 1 Bred', 'Yeezy 350 Zebra')

desiredSizes.title: Desired Sizes (US Men's)
desiredSizes.description: Array of US Men's sizes to filter for (e.g., '10', '10.5', '11')

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (USD)
maxPrice.description: Optional. Only return listings at or below this price. Leave empty for no limit.

craigslistLocations.title: Craigslist Search URLs (optional)
craigslistLocations.description: Full search URLs for Craigslist (e.g., 'https://newyork.craigslist.org/search/sss?query=jordan'). Only used if Craigslist is in targetPlatforms.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: Email to receive alerts (leave empty to disable)

slackWebhookUrl.title: Slack Webhook URL
slackWebhookUrl.description: Slack webhook for alerts (leave empty to disable)

discordWebhookUrl.title: Discord Webhook URL
discordWebhookUrl.description: Discord webhook for alerts (leave empty to disable)

maxAlertsPerHour.title: Max Alerts Per Hour
maxAlertsPerHour.description: Maximum number of alerts per hour (prevents spam)

minDealScore.title: Minimum Deal Score
minDealScore.description: Only alert on deals scoring above this threshold (0-100)

viralFeatures.title: Viral & Social Features
viralFeatures.description: Help grow the community and share great finds

enableSocialSharing.title: Enable Social Sharing Buttons
enableSocialSharing.description: Add 'Share This Deal' buttons to alerts

referralCode.title: Referral Code (Optional)
referralCode.description: Enter a friend's code to support them (no rewards, just kudos!)

publishToPublicFeed.title: Publish My Best Finds
publishToPublicFeed.description: Share anonymized high-value deals to public feed (helps other hunters!)

minCondition.title: Minimum Condition
minCondition.description: Only show listings in this condition or better

requireOgBox.title: Require Original Box/Accessories
requireOgBox.description: Only show listings with OG box and original accessories

useProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useProxy.description: Use Apify residential proxies (recommended for reliability)

maxResultsPerPlatform.title: Max Results Per Platform
maxResultsPerPlatform.description: Maximum listings to return per platform (1-500)
